reviews.review: Um dos jogos mais legais que já joguei, te possibilita a ter vários tipos de jogabilidade por conta da quantidade de perks tanto de sobreviventes quanto de assassinos. Só acho que poderia melhorar em alguns quesitos, como bugs por exemplo. Super recomendo esse jogo para qualquer pessoa.

update:
game still sucks
i like the part where the half second desync is low priority and isn't scheduled to be fixed until multiple updates in the future :D

if killers swing through pallets with enduring they get put on the wrong side and can instadown survs

new movement is munted #revertdbdmovement

they're only now addressing colorblind mode after SEVERAL YEARS because almo exposed how little of a damn bhvr gives about catering to the visually impaired and it sparked a ton of controversy 

bhvr is incredibly lazy and pump out 1 killer, 1 surv and 3 perks for each every THREE months, sometimes a map if they feel like it, and an astounding amount of bugs which take months to get fixed if they get addressed at all, even if they're gamebreaking (like invisible walls which only survivors but not killers can pass through)

quality of life updates are essentially nonexistent, there's a reason out of like 90 survivor perks like 60 of them are completely irrelevant and have no use in any build

not to mention the new hud which was hated by the overwhelming majority of people in the public test build got pushed to live servers anyway bc they were too stubborn to actually listen to the community and weren't willing to spend half an hour rearranging the hud elements in a way that wasn't littered around every corner of the fucking screen

fucking garry's mod is less buggy than this trash game and that's been out for over a decade

The only reason this game is still alive is because there's no competition - conceptually it's great, but in terms of execution it's abysmal. Wait until there's a decent competitor asymmetrical horror game and play that instead, Behaviour doesn't deserve your money.

Believe it or not, 730 hours felt like nothing. This game draws you in and it's almost impossible to stop playing. I don't know if that should be scary, or if it's just a demonstration of how good it can be. Emphasis on 'can'.

良心游戏！制作方对中国玩家超友好，就凭这一点就值得好评！
并且真的很好玩！！哈哈哈我就是又菜又爱玩。
其实我一直都很害怕恐怖游戏的，所以一开始玩的时候真的超级无敌害怕，怕到修机都修不好哈哈哈哈。
但是后面就觉得这种害怕的感觉好爽？好刺激好好玩(#^ω^#)就爱上了。
然后开始能认真修机认真逃跑了hhh，慢慢发现和屠夫正面battle也好好玩，更刺激了嘻嘻。虽然我还是菜，正面battle就是die霍霍。
而且这居然是一个充满友爱的游戏啊，路人队友愿意放弃逃跑的机会来救你，屠夫愿意抱着走不动的你四处寻找地洞，真是人间有真情、人间有真爱，我落泪了。
Very fun with friends, good for spending time during lockdown
Entertaining, methodical, constantly developing with new improvements and a good focus on swinging, some unfair things from both: The killer and the survivor. Highly recommended

After playing this game when it first came out in 2016, them taking a break later in 2017, and now coming back to it 3 years later, still a good game being developed and highly recommend if you want to try a different kind of PvP.
Really fun game! Pretty quick to get good at and doesn't require you to buy killers/survivors to be good! Really fun to play with friends!

Берешь Бубу или любого пешего мана  играешь без Кемпа и тунеля тебе присидают на воротах, всячески токсят чуть не сломав  кнопку м2 и ctrl.
В итоге ты baby killer и ты типа слабый бла бла бла, а если берешь наед на любого пешего мана они говорят бля ну кто же берет наед к примеру аничку, ну это относятся к любому ману дбд.
  Берешь медсестру или рин игра заканчивается очень быстро у сурвов тупа нет времени присидать и  токсить потому что ублюдки умирают на 3-4 генах, и в конце оказывается не в их криворукости а потому что у тебя сильные атдоны и перки бла бла бла.
  Игра за убийц балансная(нет). Всем навечкам советую играть только за медсестру, мор и рин все остальные тупа рофльные убийцы. 
  Играть за сурвов нужно только в пати, не дай баже хоть один ублюдок будет рандомным сурвов вам пизда вас будут ебать не высовывая. В одиночку игра за сурвов это ебаный целый квест где выжить крайне мала, если ты хороший сурв то поздравляю ты блять попадешь не в дбд а в симулятор починки генов где ты в среднем чинишь 3-4 гена и в конце ты умираешь потому что блять так должно быть, легче с авгана вернуться живым.
 Всем удачной игры и добро пожаловать в игру где вы станете нервным.
You'll love to hate it, but keep playing it anyway.

shit game -359.1 hours
still a shit game -1317.2 hours

[b] Game Contents [/b]
Each survivors and killers have their own unique perks. And it keeps growing because the devs still workin on updating the chapters till now.

[b] Survivors and Killers [/b]
Unfortunately, not all of them u can afford for free even I need to buy some of their chapters because of his/her OP perks. But it doesn't mean u can't play the game tho, some of them still have decent & good perks such as clowns, the hag, the plague, spirit, even some of free characters such as bill, jake, meg thomas, and david.

[b] Currency System [/b]
The currency system is pretty friendly, there are 2 currencies that u can obtain for free such as [i] bloodpoints [/i] in game to upgrade ur perks, get some items, and level up ur survivor. [i] Iridescent shards [/i] that u can obtain through ur level account and some events.

[b] Environments [/b]
Imo the lighting in this game was too dark, its a lil bit too hard for me to see. The alert sound from the killer and generator was very helpful, unfortunately maybe some of u who's not lucky will encounter some cheater especially from survivor side, but not to worry there's not as much as u think. Overall the maps is good to go!
好玩好玩

Resumão: Eu odeio esse jogo, tanto jogando sozinho como killer ou com amigos como sobreviventes esse jogo só me traz raiva e sofrimento.
Não jogue esta merda, mas se for jogar me chame.

A comunidade é tóxica como qualquer jogo com comunidade latino-americana e isso não vai mudar tão cedo. O jogo tem seus bugs como todos os outros e se ele acontece direto é porque seu PC é ruim ou você só quer ser chato e aparecer.
O jogo é ótimo para jogar com os amigos como sobrevivente (pelo menos 1 né) e quando eu to sozinho eu jogo de Killer o que é bem satisfatório.
Se você pegar na promoção compra por 14,00 (60% de desconto) é só ficar esperto.
Honestly love the game, recommend playing it with a group and playing both role of killer and survivor to improve and farm those shards. Peace out gamers and play this game.

If you like hide and seek with some twists, you'll enjoy this game. I will admit sometimes the que can take a minute but playing as killer or survivor are equally challenging and fun. Only gripe I have is that some times you can lose items or points unfairly but it seems the developers are aware and try to balance this. Choose your perks wisely and be aware that the killers may have a perk that counters it to some degree. GG.
